participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and optimistic, with a passion for helping others.
participant_1.background: has spent several years working in various support roles and is now pursuing a career as a life coach.

content.text: Hell yeah!I got a new job, after all these years finally im going to be a life coach.What is your wish for future?
